overview: When Susie arrives at Crystal Lake Nudist Camp to be the resident masseuse, she meets the randy young camp owner Kyle, who can't wait to get an orgy going with his nymphomaniac staff and guests. But when people start inexplicably disappearing, Susie and Kyle are forced to fight for their survival, coming face to face with the flesh-eating semen of the legendary Jason himself!
title: Official Friday the 13th Parody
